article_title: RightOpt exchange opens doors to retirees
article_text:
RightOpt, a private health insurance exchange operated by Buck Consultants, has been expanded to include an employer’s retirees.

The exchange, one of dozens that have popped up in response to the Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act, has more than 400,000 active participants, making it one of the largest in the country.
